General.Name: Binh Duong Water Environment JSC
General.Description: Binh Duong Water - Environment Joint Stock Company engages in the water supply, sewerage, and waste and waste water treatment activities in Vietnam. The company is involved in the investment, exploitation, treatment, and supply of treated water for household and production use; development and management of drainage system and irrigation works; collection and treatment of domestic, hazardous, and industrial waste for composting production. It also provides civil engineering and prepare services for water supply, drainage system, irrigation works, class III or smaller size civil house, middle or low voltage electric wire, 35KVA transformer, public lighting system, and class III or smaller size communication route. In addition, the company trades in materials used for water sector, recycling area, production, scrap, collected units from waste, and equipment and tools; undertakes services for public works comprising canal or septic tank cleaning, cesspool sucking, road washing, and ornamental plants; and offers investigation services, such as design and cost estimate, and feasibility study for investment project, as well as appraises the investment projects. Further, it provides supervision service supply for construction works, including civil engineering or industrial construction, water supply, drainage system, irrigation works, and technical infrastructure works; and makes the design for urban or rural water supply and drainage system, civil works or industrial works, and medium or small size irrigation works. It also engages in offices/factories leasing activities; production of purified drinking water and ice; operation of Restaurant; and construction of waste treatment facilities and environment. Binh Duong Water - Environment Joint Stock Company was founded in 1975 and is based in Thu Dau Mot, Vietnam. Binh Duong Water - Environment Joint Stock Company is a subsidiary of Investment and Industrial Development Corporation.
